definitions.definition: The passing of title to an estate upon death.
That which a person is entitled to inherit, by law or testament.
The act or mechanism of inheriting; the state of having inherited
definitions.example: The Indo-European languages share various similarities as a result of their inheritance from a common ancestor.

definitions.definition: (genetic algorithms) The biological attributes passed hereditarily from ancestors to their offspring.
The mechanism whereby parts of a superclass are available to instances of its subclass.
